title: ChatGPT (Open AI) Security, Privacy & Ethical Hacking
headline: Learn to use ChatGPT for pentesting in this free online cybersecurity course that explores the risks posed by AI.
description: This course helps you to unlock the ethical hacking power of ChatGPT. We provide techniques for investigating, evaluating and monitoring cyber threats and provide new ways to enhance your ethical hacking skills with the cutting-edge ChatGPT AI conversational chatbot, which puts you ahead of the curve with its ability to generate human-readable text. We explain how to take full advantage of AI chatbots to enhance your cybersecurity skills.
courseDescription:
Do you want to improve your cybersecurity skills? Get ready to embark on an exciting journey as you learn how to investigate, evaluate and monitor the ever-changing ChatGPT ecosystem, which is an interactive artificial intelligence (AI) machine learning (ML) system that generates human-readable text to interact with us. This course provides access to free tools that can generate images, text, videos, code and hacking methods, making it an indispensable tool for ethical hackers who test the vulnerability of networks in the face of cyber threats posed by their unethical counterparts.

ChatGPT can be a valuable tool for organisations, businesses and even individuals who want to find and fix security vulnerabilities. However, if it falls into the wrong hands, the service can become a dangerous tool for malicious hackers. This course provides you with hands-on labs and real-world training to lay the foundation required to start your ChatGPT penetration testing (also known as ‘pentesting’ or ‘ethical hacking’) journey. We explain how to access sensitive information, conduct attacks, modify and inject malicious queries, hack the operating system and software directories and much more.

A certificate in GPTChat pentesting and ethical hacking represents a valuable addition to your résumé and can lead to intriguing professional options in the fields of AI, ML and cybersecurity. You could work in the information security (infosec) or emerging tech departments of ‘Fortune 500’ companies, become an AI security analyst or work as a remote threat intelligence analyst. The median salary for this field is £25 000 to £55 000 per annum, depending on experience. Enrol in this course and take your first step towards a fulfilling and well-lucrative career in ethical hacking and cybersecurity.

Start Course Now
certificateDetail:
All Alison courses are free to enrol study and complete. To successfully complete this course and become an Alison Graduate, you need to achieve 80% or higher in each course assessment. Once you have completed this course, you have the option to acquire an official Diploma, which is a great way to share your achievement with the world.

Your Alison is:
  • Ideal for sharing with potential employers
  • Include it in your CV, professional social media profiles and job applications.
  • An indication of your commitment to continuously learn, upskill & achieve high results.
  • An incentive for you to continue empowering yourself through lifelong learning.
Alison offers 3 types of Diplomas for completed Diploma courses:
  • Digital : a downloadable in PDF format immediately available to you when you complete your purchase.
  • : a physical version of your officially branded and security-marked , posted to you with FREE shipping.
  • Framed : a physical version of your officially branded and security marked in a stylish frame, posted to you with FREE shipping.

All are available to purchase through the Alison Shop. For more information on purchasing Alison , please visit our FAQs. If you decide not to purchase your Alison , you can still demonstrate your achievement by sharing your Learner Record or Learner Achievement Verification, both of which are accessible from your Dashboard.
